case.title: Lovely black woman searching for relationship - 47 (England)
case.text:
Hi I'm a 47 year old, tall, slim black woman in search of a man who is ready to stop being single. Please only reply to my ad if you are not in a relationship. I prefer a man who is tall (5.9 plus), kind, romantic, considerate, fun, ambitious and happy with himself.
In return you will get a very sensual attractive black woman who will be totally committed to her man. I am a single mother, so if you don't like children, then I'm not the one for you.
Please reply as I am sure you won't be disappointed.
Thank you
